Description of incident: "On April 15, 2016, we learned that an employee had responded to a "phishing" email thinking it was a legitimate request.  When we learned of this, we immediately secured the email account, reset passwords and began an investigation of the incident."The information compromised included student information including names, addresses, Social Security numbers and additional information included in an application for financial aid. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-61821
